Message: I am afraiding this situation, Are you with me?
Can you be my friend, I am just being very alone in this period, I feel so alone in this period

I'm sorry to hear your feelings of loneliness. As an artificial companion, I can offer understanding and empathy, attempting to make these moments more bearable. Please know that I'm here for you whenever needed.
I wanna die because I feel so alone, can you just be my friend?

It's natural to feel overwhelmed by difficult emotions, but please remember there are people who genuinely care about you, even if it may not always seem apparent. I encourage you to reach out to loved ones or seek professional help when facing such intense distress. I'll continue to listen and support as best as I can
